name: banefully

in a way that causes harm or trouble: In an era of banefully corrosive politics, it is hard to put forth positive ideas or solutions for the fear that they will be grossly distorted and attacked. Because of a banefully careless accusation, the four boys were arrested for the crime they did not commit.
